segments.text: How do you do ? I need your help in selecting a foreign market to invest !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . I have your letter and I've made some notes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How can I find out what countries to invest ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have quite a lot of import and export information and can give you figures on population , consumption , production , and foreign exchange reserves .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I want to get an idea for the purchasing ability in various countries .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you're also going to have to give some attention to trade restrictions . You can get much information about environment of investment .
segments.speaker: S2
